Definition: In this task, you are given a news article. Your task is to classify the article to one out of the four topics 'World', 'Sports', 'Business', 'Sci/Tech'. This is based on if the article's main topic is relevant to the world, sports, business, and science/technology, correspondingly. If you are unsure of the topic, choose the closest option. Note that URLs in the text have been replaced with [Link].

Positive Examples.explanation: The topic of the news article is relevant to science(astronomy). Hence, the label is 'Sci/Tech'.
